Sentece: After oral dosing the mean peak plasma concentration was 116 ng/ml and mean bioavailability was 75%.
Title: Pharmacokinetics and Pharmacodynamics of procyclidine in man.
Name: Procyclidine

Sentece: After both oral and intravenous dosing the mean values for the volume of distribution, total body clearance and plasma elimination half-life of procyclidine were in the order of 1 l/kg, 68 ml/min and 12 h respectively.
Title: Pharmacokinetics and Pharmacodynamics of procyclidine in man.
Name: Procyclidine

Sentece: The nasal bioavailability of procyclidine in rats and dogs, based on the radioactivity, was calculated to be 81.1 and 98.6%, respectively.
Title: Nasal absorption of procyclidine in rats and dogs.
Name: Procyclidine
